Uses of Package
org.cougaar.core.persist

Packages that use org.cougaar.core.persist
org.cougaar.core.adaptivity This package contains the Cougaar adaptivity engine and client APIs. 
org.cougaar.core.blackboard This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService. 
org.cougaar.core.persist This package contains the Cougaar persistence and rehydration support. 
org.cougaar.core.plugin.freeze   
org.cougaar.core.qos.frame Overview: The Cougaar Frame infrastructure provides a lightweight and efficiently distributed form of knowledge representation supporting two independent inheritance hierarchies, path following, and code generation.

FilePersistenceBase
          This PersistencePlugin abstract base class saves and restores blackboard objects in files.
Persistence
          An extended persistence interface for BlackboardPersistence.
PersistenceAssociation
          This class establishes an association between an object that has been persisted and a reference number.
PersistenceException
          An exception to be throw when exceptions occur during persistence operations.
PersistenceIdentity
          A unique PersistenceClient identifier.
PersistenceObject
          An opaque class to contain the persistence snapshot.
PersistencePlugin
          A media-specific persistence handler for reading and writing snapshots.
PersistencePluginAdapter
          Adapter to simplify writing PersistencePlugin implementations.
PersistencePluginSupport
          Support methods for PersistencePlugins.
PersistenceReference
          Objects of this class replace objects that have been previously persisted.
PersistenceService
          This service allows clients to rehydrate data from the most recent persistence snapshot.
PersistenceStream
          Marker interface for persistence I/O streams.
PersistenceSubscriberState
          Persistence state for a blackboard Subscriber.
RehydrationData
          Rehydration has two results to return, where this little class simply bundles them together.
RehydrationResult
          Rehydration has three results to return, where this little class simply bundles them together.
SequenceNumbers
          A persistence sequence range and timestamp.
